column1: I’ll, describe, it, as, giddy, –, the, way, I, feel, writing, you, this, note, and, welcoming, you, to, the, first, edition, of, AXA, Mansard's, #SwitchOn, Newsletter., I, think, it’s, because, one, of, my, many, childhood, dreams, is, to, be, an, Editor-in-Chief, of, a, magazine., I, guess, dreams, do, come, true!, It’s, exciting, being, able, to, hand, deliver, all, the, amazing, things, going, on, in, and, around, AXA, into, your, mailbox
